name: Pooh
content: You can be happy everyday but there are happy things everyday.

name: Rafiki
content: The past can hurt, but the way I see it, you can either run from it or learn from it.

name: Aladdin
content: Today's special moments are tomorrow's memories.

name: Belle
content: It's not until you lose everything that you can truly appreciate everything

name: Rapunzel
content: Venture outside your comfort zone. The rewards are worth it.

name: Ratatouille
content: The only thing predictable about life is it's unpredictability
